Initial commit: Complete Snake Game implementation

- Keyboard controls using arrow keys
- Collision detection for walls and self-collision
- Random food generation that avoids snake segments
- Refactored nested ternary operations for better readability
- Fixed React Hook dependencies and key prop warnings
- Enhanced index.html with SEO meta tags and Open Graph support
